name: tiro-notes
description: Tiro Notes CLI to start Tiro Notes from the command line!

scripts.export-cli-module: cp -r ../../build node-build; cp cli.js node-build/; cp package.json node-build/;
scripts.publish-to-npm-prod: cd ./platforms/npm-cli-module; npm run clean-previous-build; npm run export-cli-module; npm run export-helpers; echo WARNING REQUIRES NPM LOGIN BEFORE PUBLISHING!; cd node-build; npm publish
scripts.publish-to-npm-dev: cd ./platforms/npm-cli-module; npm run clean-previous-build; npm run export-cli-module; npm run export-helpers; echo WARNING REQUIRES NPM LOGIN BEFORE PUBLISHING!; cd node-build; npm publish --tag=develop
